course_description: This course is a refresher of critical math skills you will use regularly in your MSBA Classes. Topics covered include: Calculus Review, Basic Probability, Random Variables and Probability Distributions, Sampling and Sampling Distributions, Bayesian Approach, Matrices, and Logarithms. Bootcamp does not teach these subjects but rather refreshes the student's prior knowledge of the aforementioned topics.
